name: Baked Cod Recipe With Lemon And Garlic
ingredients: Cod, lemon, garlic, olive oil, butter, salt, pepper, parsley
description: Mix together the lemon juice, olive oil, and melted butter in a shallow bowl (do not add the garlic yet).

name: Baked White Fish Recipe, Mediterranean-Style
ingredients: Fish, garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, parsley, salt, pepper, paprika, cumin, coriander, cayenne pepper
description: Pat the fish dry and season with salt and pepper on both sides. Brush a 9 Â½ x 13-inch baking dish with a little extra virgin olive oil and put the fish in it.

name: 20-Minute Fish Piccata
ingredients: paprika, oregano, garlic powder, salt, pepper, fish, olive oil, butter, garlic, lemon juice, capers, parsley
description: Season the fish on both sides with salt and pepper. Mix the oregano, paprika, and garlic powder and season the flesh side of the fish.
